pericope_titles.title: The Creation of the Heavens and the Earth
pericope_titles.theme: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth, establishing order from void, and rested upon the seventh day.

pericope_titles.title: The Garden of Eden and the Formation of Man
pericope_titles.theme: The LORD God formed man from the dust and placed him in the garden to keep and tend it as steward of creation.

pericope_titles.title: The Temptation of Man and the Promise of Redemption
pericope_titles.theme: The serpent beguiled woman and man fell into transgression; yet the seed of the woman shall bruise the serpent's head.

pericope_titles.title: Cain and Abel: The Way of Sacrifice and Murder
pericope_titles.theme: Cain's offering was rejected; in his wrath he slew his brother, bringing the first blood guilt upon the earth.

pericope_titles.title: The Generations of Adam unto the Days of Noah
pericope_titles.theme: Enoch walked with God and was taken; the rest of mankind multiplied in iniquity until the flood brought judgment.

pericope_titles.title: The Corruption of Mankind and the Building of the Ark
pericope_titles.theme: The earth was filled with violence and corrupt imaginings; God commanded Noah to build an ark for the saving of his house.

pericope_titles.title: The Flood and God's Covenant with a Token
pericope_titles.theme: The waters prevailed upon the earth; yet God remembered Noah, and set His bow in the cloud as a token of the covenant.

pericope_titles.title: The Law Against Murder and the Governance of Nations
pericope_titles.theme: God set a law that whoso sheddeth man's blood shall have his own blood shed; God's dominion endureth over all.

pericope_titles.title: Babel: The Confusion of Tongues and Human Rebellion
pericope_titles.theme: The sons of men built a city and tower to make a name for themselves, wherefore the LORD confounded their language.

pericope_titles.title: The Call of Abram Out of Ur of the Chaldees
pericope_titles.theme: The LORD said unto Abram: Get thee out of thy country unto a land I shall show thee; he departed not knowing whither.

pericope_titles.title: Lot's Choice and the Separation of the Righteous
pericope_titles.theme: Lot lifted up his eyes and chose the plain of Jordan, not knowing he drew nigh to Sodom, a city appointed unto destruction.

pericope_titles.title: Melchizedek, King of Salem and Priest of the Most High God
pericope_titles.theme: Melchizedek brought forth bread and wine and blessed Abram, and Abram gave him tithes of all.

pericope_titles.title: The Covenant Made in a Vision: The Seed Shall Be as the Stars
pericope_titles.theme: God promised Abram his seed shall be as the stars, though the Amorites' iniquity was not yet full.

pericope_titles.title: Hagar and Ishmael: The Covenant Sealed with Circumcision
pericope_titles.theme: Sarai gave Hagar unto Abram, and he took her; yet God's covenant was established with Isaac by the sign of circumcision.

pericope_titles.title: The Visitation of the Angels and the Intercession of Abraham
pericope_titles.theme: The LORD appeared to Abraham as three men; he made intercession for Sodom, but the city passed the bound of mercy.

pericope_titles.title: The Flight of Lot and the Birth of Isaac
pericope_titles.theme: Lot lingered; the angels hasted him, saying: Escape for thy life. Yet Sarah conceived and Isaac was born in the appointed time.

pericope_titles.title: The Binding of Isaac: A Figure of the Self-Sacrifice of God
pericope_titles.theme: God commanded Abraham to offer Isaac his son; in this trial was revealed the magnitude of God's self-denial in giving His own.

pericope_titles.title: The Death of Sarah and the Taking of Rebekah
pericope_titles.theme: Sarah died and was buried in the cave of Machpelah; a bride was taken for Isaac from afar, that the covenant continue.

pericope_titles.title: Esau and Jacob: The Birthright Despised for a Pottage
pericope_titles.theme: Esau, faint from hunting, sold his birthright for a mess of pottage, thus he despised his birthright before the LORD.

pericope_titles.title: Jacob's Vision at Bethel: The Ladder Reaching unto Heaven
pericope_titles.theme: Jacob saw a ladder set up on the earth, and the top of it reached to heaven; the angels of God ascended and descended upon it.

pericope_titles.title: Jacob's Service unto Laban and the Striving of Two Wives
pericope_titles.theme: Jacob served fourteen years for Rachel; yet Laban deceived him with Leah, and strife entered through multiplied wives.

pericope_titles.title: Peniel: Jacob's Wrestling and Transformation at Daybreak
pericope_titles.theme: There wrestled a man with Jacob until the breaking of the day; and he said, Thy name shall be called Israel.

pericope_titles.title: The Humbling of Jacob's House: The Dinah Tragedy and Purification
pericope_titles.theme: Dinah was defiled by Shechem; Jacob's sons spoiled the city. Jacob commanded: Put away your strange gods and be clean.

pericope_titles.title: The Generations of Esau: The Rejected Line
pericope_titles.theme: These are the generations of Esau: he is Edom. Thus was the rejected line sealed, the covenant passing unto Jacob.

pericope_titles.title: Joseph's Dreaming: Rejected by His Brethren
pericope_titles.theme: Joseph dreamed a dream and told it unto his brethren; they hated him yet more, saying: Shall he reign over us?

pericope_titles.title: Joseph's Integrity: Temptation Resisted Through Early Impressions
pericope_titles.theme: Joseph was brought unto Potiphar's house; when tempted, he refused, saying: How can I do this great wickedness?

pericope_titles.title: Joseph in Prison: The Path of Tribulation Unto Exaltation
pericope_titles.theme: Though Joseph suffered in the house of the prison, the LORD was with him and showed him mercy and gave him favor.

pericope_titles.title: Joseph Exalted: A Man in Whom the Spirit of God Dwelleth
pericope_titles.theme: Pharaoh said unto Joseph: Can we find such a one as this is, a man in whom the Spirit of God is?

pericope_titles.title: Joseph's Testing of His Brethren: Repentance and Reconciliation
pericope_titles.theme: His brethren confessed: We are verily guilty; yet Joseph said: God meant it unto good, to save much people alive.

pericope_titles.title: Vayechi: Jacob's Blessing and the Promise Perpetual
pericope_titles.theme: Jacob blessed his sons, saying unto Judah: The scepter shall not depart from thee. Thus was the covenant made sure forever.
